type.name: WeatherColorSet
type.summary: Represents a set of weather colors for each of the eight parts of the day: early dawn, dawn, late dawn, day, early dusk, late dusk and night.

property.name: Dawn
property.summary: Gets or sets the weather color during the early dawn.

property.name: Day
property.summary: Gets or sets the weather color during the day.

property.name: Dusk
property.summary: Gets or sets the weather color during the dusk.

property.name: EarlyDawn
property.summary: Gets or sets the weather color during the dawn.

property.name: EarlyDusk
property.summary: Gets or sets the weather color during the early dusk.

property.name: LateDawn
property.summary: Gets or sets the weather color during the late dawn.

property.name: LateDusk
property.summary: Gets or sets the weather color during the late dusk.

property.name: Night
property.summary: Gets or sets the weather color during the night.
